scripts.solver:build: npm run solver:export && npm run solver:postflop:build
scripts.solver:export: cargo run --release --manifest-path tools/cfr-export/Cargo.toml -- tools/poker-cfr/output/preflop-20-75000.bin src/solver/data/preflop-20bb.json && cargo run --release --manifest-path tools/cfr-export/Cargo.toml -- tools/poker-cfr/output/preflop-40-210000.bin src/solver/data/preflop-40bb.json && cargo run --release --manifest-path tools/cfr-export/Cargo.toml -- tools/poker-cfr/output/preflop-100-670000.bin src/solver/data/preflop-100bb.json
